title: Töhryvahti – Report Vandalism
takePhoto: Take photo of graffiti or select file
privacyPhotoText: Please ensure no people or personal data are visible in the photo. Reports containing images of people will be automatically rejected due to privacy regulations.
locationPermissionDeniedDesc: Browser is not allowed to access location data. Enable location in settings or use manual location.
locationUnavailableDesc: Location data cannot be determined. Check GPS connection or use manual location.
locationTimeoutDesc: Location request took too long. Try again or use manual location.
locationErrorGeneric: Location data could not be retrieved. Use manual location.
locationHelp: Location data could not be retrieved
locationHelpDesc: You can continue in the following ways:
enableLocationInBrowser: Allow location in browser (click lock icon in address bar)
manualLocationOption: Use the button below to select location on map
descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the graffiti and its exact location (e.g., 'On electrical box next to the park')...
name: Name
contactNote: Contact information is used only for updates on case processing
thankYouMessage: Your report has been received and will be processed soon. Once the report has been reviewed and approved, it will appear in the public map view.
mapTrackingNotice: You can track approved reports in the map view
publicMapDescription: All verified reports on the map
clickMapToSelect: Click on the map to select a report
geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser
httpsRequired: Location access requires a secure connection (HTTPS)
enableLocationMobile: Enable location in your browser settings: Settings > Privacy & Security > Location Services
enableLocationDesktop: Enable location in your browser: Click the location icon in the address bar or check browser settings
allowLocationAccess: Please allow location access when prompted by your browser
replitMobileRestriction: The Replit mobile app has location restrictions. For best results, open this form in your mobile browser (Safari, Chrome, etc.)
locationObtainedSuccessfully: Your location has been set automatically
locationErrorGeneral: Unable to get your location. Please use manual location selection.
locationPermissionDeniedDesc: Please enable location permissions in your browser settings and try again.
locationUnavailableDesc: Please check your GPS/network connection and try again.
locationTimeoutDesc: Location request timed out. Please try again or use manual selection.
submitError: Report submission failed. Please try again.
propertyOwnerHelp: Determine responsible party for cleaning procedures
contactInfoHelp: Providing contact information is optional. We only use this information to send you status updates about your reported issue. You can submit reports anonymously.
contactStatusUpdates: Contact information is only used for providing status updates about the reported issue

cookieConsent.title: Cookies and Privacy
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to remember your language preference and manage sessions. Data is processed according to GDPR regulations.

validation.oneImageOnlyDesc: You can only add one image per report

disclaimer.betaVersion: BETA VERSION: Töhryvahti is an open beta-stage free public service aimed at enabling a more pleasant and graffiti-free environment for all city residents. The service may contain errors or be interrupted without prior notice.
disclaimer.dataProcessing: By using this service, you agree that the information you report and the images you submit will be processed by the service provider to improve the city's attractiveness and promote graffiti removal. All reports are reviewed and inappropriate reports are removed without prior notice. The service does not guarantee immediate initiation of actions.

infoPage.title: About Töhryvahti
infoPage.subtitle: Easy-to-use tool for reporting vandalism and graffiti
infoPage.whatIsContent: Töhryvahti is an easy-to-use tool designed for citizens and authorities to report vandalism and graffiti directly on a map. The goal is to enable a cleaner and more pleasant living environment and facilitate planning for cleaning and monitoring – regardless of who manages the vandalized property.
infoPage.whatCanDoTitle: What can you do with Töhryvahti?
infoPage.reportEasilyDesc: take a photo, locate the position on the map, and add additional information if desired.
infoPage.followOnMapDesc: see reported locations on the map by district.
infoPage.trackStatisticsDesc: the tool can be used to monitor the amount and development of vandalism over time and by area – helping to target cleaning and resources more efficiently.
infoPage.dataUsageIntro: Data is stored anonymously and can be utilized for example in:
infoPage.budgetPlanning: municipal budget planning and prioritizing cleaning needs
infoPage.statisticalTracking: statistical monitoring and identifying recurring problem areas
infoPage.serviceProviders: supporting service providers' bidding and contracts
infoPage.officialServiceContent: Töhryvahti is a city-independent citizen-led project currently in development. The goal is to establish cooperation with cities, authorities, property owners, and cleaning services so that collected data can be utilized as effectively as possible.

disclaimer.betaVersion: BETA VERSION: Töhryvahti is an open beta phase free public service aimed at enabling a more pleasant and graffiti-free environment for all citizens. The service may contain errors or be interrupted without notice.
disclaimer.dataProcessing: By using this service, you agree that the information you report and the images you send are processed by the service provider to improve the city's attractiveness and promote graffiti removal. All reports are reviewed and inappropriate reports are removed without notice. The service does not guarantee immediate action.
